alert.note: Alert for Clinton; Russell (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 29 at 6:28PM EDT until July 29 at 7:15PM EDT by NWS Louisville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Louisville has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Clinton County in south central Kentucky... Russell County in south central Kentucky... * Until 615 PM CDT. * At 528 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Jamestown, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Jamestown, Russell Springs, Jabez, Eli, Whittle, Cumberland City, Esto, Karlus, Russell County Airport and Ono. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
